Class Mapa

java.lang.Object
org.etf.unibl.danilo_todorovic_1156_22_pj.simulacija.Mapa
public class Mapa extends Object
Singleton class that represents a map for vehicle placement and management.

    • azurirajPoziciju

      public javafx.scene.control.Label azurirajPoziciju(int x, int y, String vrsta, String id, int baterija)
      Updates the position on the map with a new vehicle label.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the position.
      vrsta - The type of vehicle.
      id - The ID of the vehicle.
      baterija - The battery percentage of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      The Label representing the vehicle, or null if the position is invalid.

    • resetujPoziciju

      Resets the position on the map by removing the specified label.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the position.
      label - The label to remove.

    • resetujPozicijuNaDefault

      public void resetujPozicijuNaDefault(int x, int y)
      Resets the position on the map to its default state by clearing all labels.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the position.
